issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
The *uid* value of the Facebook module evaluates as 'undefined' when using a cached session.

If the session has been newly created then the value is populated. It is only after the app has been closed and reopened am I seeing this problem.

Other values such as *accessToken* seem to be fine.
fields.summary: Facebook 'uid' value evaluates as 'undefined' when using a cached session
fields.environment: iOS 8.3, SDK 4.0.0.GA, Facebook Module 4.0.3, Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.0.1.20150621908

comments.body: [~doittwice] can you please attach a test case?
